Pez Solutions

About

Pez Solutions is a fancy name for my homelab. It's a collection of servers and services that I run for myself. Most of the services I also open up to friends and family, but I'm not a hosting company.

Currently, I have 3 servers in London and 3 servers in Copenhagen. In the past, I've experimented with rented servers, but I found that having any running costs was detrimental to my motivation.

For comprehensive technical documentation, visit our GitHub repository: pez-docs.

Infrastructure

Our infrastructure spans two primary locations (London and Copenhagen) with multiple servers per location, ensuring high availability and redundancy. We maintain a 99.9% uptime SLO.
